items.content_html: Happy 47th birthday to Apple, and 19th birthday to Gmail… Couldn’t get by without either of them.
items.content_text: Happy 47th birthday to Apple, and 19th birthday to Gmail... Couldn't get by without either of them.
Lone Joshua Tree

items.content_html: Going to try a time-blocking technique on my work calendar for a bit by adding four hour “Get Shit Done” blocks Tuesday and Thursday afternoons. In those blocks, I’ll block smaller times for tasks that need total focus. Meeting requests during those times will be ignored. Let’s see how that works.
items.content_text: Going to try a time-blocking technique on my work calendar for a bit by adding four hour "Get Shit Done" blocks Tuesday and Thursday afternoons. items.content_html:
Do you ever have those days when it seems everyone around you is frantic and acting like the sky is falling and you’re the only one who can save them?

Yeah, it’s one of those days.
